meanings.sent1: She premodified the cake recipe before making any changes.
meanings.sent2: The designer premodified the logo before finalizing it.
meanings.sent3: He premodified his speech, adding humor before the serious parts.
meanings.sent4: The artist premodified the sketch, enhancing the details before coloring.
meanings.sent5: The chef premodified the ingredients, marinating them for extra flavor.

meanings.definition: Modify (something) before it is used or presented.
meanings.sent1: They premodified the presentation slides before the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The team premodified the report before submitting it.
meanings.sent3: She premodified the outfit, adding accessories for a stylish look.
meanings.sent4: The teacher premodified the lesson plan, simplifying it for the students.
meanings.sent5: He premodified the car, tuning it up before the road trip.
